Title: Creates the non-profit organization financial relief fund
Summary: Creates the non-profit organization financial relief fund to compensate certain non-profit organizations that do not receive federal funding as a result of a lapse in appropriations by the United States government that begins on or after December 22, 2018.
LawCode: Add ยง630-h, Tax L; add ยง99-ff, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to the non-profit organization financial relief fund
